subtitle: Serve this beef fondue with salads, breads and a selection of dips.

method.text: Dry the meat on kitchen paper and divide between small serving dishes.
Heat the oil in the fondue pot to 190°C / 375F. Test by dropping a small cube of bread into the oil - it should brown in less than 1 min.
Very carefully, transfer the fondue pan to its lighted spirit stove to keep hot. Drop in the bay leaf and garlic.
Each person uses their fondue fork to cook their meat in the oil until it's done to their liking.
Transfer meat from the fondue fork onto a plate and eat straightaway.

title: Fondue Bourguignon
